overview: The film is based on the play by Ekaterina Dorn "And we laugh". This is a story about how a real bullying was born out of one innocent joke on a classmate. Blood, tears, remorse – there is practically no such thing in the film. There is only a premonition of tragedy, a hint of violence and the search for the "extreme"... and a teacher, a class teacher who could change everything, but did not dare or did not want to.
title: Igor - Chair
